document_data.name: Qualf Grizzlebeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Qualf Grizzlebeard''' was a barfly in [[Skullport]] in [[1379 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Qualf was a barfly but secretly worked for the [[Gray Hands]], gathering information about criminal organizations in Skullport.
document_data.History: In 1379 DR, Qualf was captured together with some [[elves]]Â by some [[Unyielding Sword]] mercenaries working for the slaver [[Lanador]].[[Derek Myers]]. "Eyes on The Ball." ''[[Dungeon (magazine)|Dungeon]]'' #206. Renton, WA: Wizards of the Coast, September 2012.
